DOC.brief_title: Multiple Dose Study Evaluating Safety Tolerability NSA-789
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Men woman age 18 50 year ( healthy subject ) great 55 year old ( subject Alzheimer 's Disease ) Women must surgically sterile postmenopausal Subjects Alzheimer 's Disease must generally healthy , may stable , chronic illness well control . Exclusion Criteria Healthy subject may prescription investigation drug within 30 day start study . Subjects Alzheimer 's Disease may cholinesterase inhibitor donepezil ( Aricept® ) rivastigmine ( Exelon® ) within 4 week start study .
